Title: Illuminated Chapter Heading for Chapter 106 (Surat Quraysh)
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.562 is a text page with an illuminated chapter heading for chapter 106 (Surat Quraysh). The title is written in the New Abbasid (Broken Cursive) style in gold ink on a blue ground with green arabesques.
Keywords: Arabic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Iran; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Medallion; Ornament; Prayer; Qur`an; Scripture; Timurid; New Abbasid Style
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian (?)
